page.title: 10Improving our Area: Kirkby
page.content: Results of a survey conducted by J4. We asked some children in our school to say what they would like done to improve the area in which they live. This is a list of what they said: 1) More street bins to lessen litter 2) More street cleaners 3) Provide more doctor's surgeries, as people have to travel quite a long way for attention 4) Dog Wardens should come round daily as there are so many dogs roaming round and they frighten the little children 5) More policemen on the beat 6) More facilities for young children 7) Fence round and clean up the River Alt 8) Improve employment prospects by encouraging firms to come into the area 9) More clubs for teenagers.
